name: Going Ice Fishin'
description:
Made in 36 hours for the Mini Jam 91.

== Controls ==

Game's controls are W/Up Arrow and S/Down Arrow to move the bait up/down.

When you catch a fish in the water, you must bring it out to the surface and only then can you catch another one.

== Credits ==

All art and code made by the game's developer, WizardDev1234.
